SYSTEM: Ruiziniesta_030414.pdf: Página 6
Motivation 
• Open Educational Repositories (OERs) 
• Information overload 
• Educational resources adapted to the student's learning 
needs 
• A restricted number of Learning Objects (LOs) and 
diversity in the proposals 
• Reduce the amount of effort 
• Challenge 
• Provide smart support for accessing to the LOs that are in 
repositories
